mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pptpd_admin TAB WHERE TAB.USERNAME=${username}
SELECT TAB.ID,TAB.USERNAME,TAB.PASSWORD,TAB.STATUS,USERTYPE,TAB.MEMO FROM pptpd_admin TAB WHERE TAB.USERNAME =#{username} AND TAB.PASSWORD=PASSWORD(#{password})
SELECT TAB.ID,TAB.USERNAME,TAB.PASSWORD,TAB.STATUS,USERTYPE,TAB.MEMO FROM pptpd_admin TAB WHERE TAB.ID=#{id} ORDER BY TAB.ID DESC
